message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but you'll get a decent start. We can work out something more even later!
You took the lion's share last time, now it's my turn!
Okay, I'll take a bit less this time, but I still need a bigger share to stay ahead of inflation. Let's try to reach a compromise.
I'll give you a bit more this time, but I'm not going to give up yet!
I'm willing to give you a bit more this time. Let's meet in the middle and avoid the risk of getting nothing.
I'm not giving up yet! I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
We're running out of time, let's be reasonable and split the money fairly. We'll both end up with more this way than if we keep rejecting offers.
